data.name: Aebal
data.detailed_description:
Aebal: a procedurally generated rhythm game where you dodge generated enemies synchronized to your choice of music.


Discord: https://aebal.xyz/discord
data.about_the_game:
Aebal: a procedurally generated rhythm game where you dodge generated enemies synchronized to your choice of music.


Discord: https://aebal.xyz/discord
data.short_description: Aebal, the rhythm game where you need to avoid the stuff on screen.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated / AMD Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX-470, Nvidia GTX-980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Anything with Proton
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated / AMD Integrated
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Anything with Proton
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX-470, Nvidia GTX-980
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
